vehicles.description: A white sedan is parked on the right side of the road, facing our direction, with a dark hatchback parked beside it also facing our direction.
vehicles.explanation: These parked vehicles reduce the available road width for our car and may obstruct the view of other road users, such as pedestrians emerging from between the vehicles.

general_perception.description and explanation: The image shows a white sedan parked on the right side of the road, facing our direction, along with a dark hatchback parked beside it, also facing our direction. These parked vehicles reduce the available road width for our car and may obstruct the view of other road users, such as pedestrians emerging from between the vehicles. There are no other vulnerable road users, traffic signs, traffic lights, traffic cones, barriers, or other objects present in the image.

driving_suggestion: Please drive cautiously, maintain a safe distance from parked vehicles, and be vigilant for their potential movements or the appearance of pedestrians. Self-driving vehicles should also stay within the traffic lanes according to road markings. When passing obstacles, use the vehicle's headlights and hazard warning lights if necessary to increase visibility to others. Due to low visibility, slow down to have a safer reaction time for any sudden hazards.

1.description and explanation: A stationary car is positioned on the side of the road. As this vehicle is not in motion, it acts as a static obstacle for the ego car. Depending on its proximity to the driving lane, the ego car may need to adjust its trajectory to maintain a safe distance from the parked car and ensure there is ample room to pass without risking a collision. The ego car's sensors should continue to monitor the stationary car for any signs of movement that might affect its path.
